Welcome to NextGenLabs

Join us on a journey to transform to the NextGen Future.

Find Out More

Who we are

We are a young company with highly skilled and passionate people who bring plethora of experience in delivering IT solutions.We have the best talent in cutting edge technologies like Bio-informatics, Life sciences, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Scalable Enterprise Solutions, Cloud Computing, Web Development, Mobile Development etc. We are experts in providing technological training for students, university faculties and corporate employees to enable them with the latest technologies.

How can we help?

Training

We have experience in providing Academic (Students and Faculty), Corporate trainings for various technologies ranging from Mobile development (iOS), Machine Learning, BioInformatics, Systems Biology, Computational Biology etc.

Consulting

We have experience in working with various organizations to achieve their strategic and business objectives. We have helped organizations to bridge the gap between business and technology by providing custom IT solutions based on their requirements.

R&D Consulting

We have a team of research scientists who have a wide spectrum of experience ranging from embedded systems, NLP, Machine Learning and Computational Systems Biology. We have been associated with Interdisciplinary Research Centers of Various Academic Institutions and have provided consulting services to achieve the research objectives of the research scholars.

Career Guidence and Counselling

We have team of certified professionals with over 20+ year experience who have counselled umpteen number of students from adolescents to young adults who provide career guidence and offer counselling services.

Our Team

Vijay Kulkarni , Founder

Mr Vijay Kulkarni , currently works at Thermofisher Scientific on Computational Proteomics and is involved in developing Machine Learning Algorithms on Mass Spectrometry and Peptide Matching. Prior to this , he was working at Jaitra Inc on Architecting and Developing Data Centric Applications for Enterprises using various stacks that include ML , NLP , AWS etc. He has also worked at Seachange and Cisco where he has predominantly worked on Digital Video Broadcasting . He is associated with FSMK and handles sessions on FOSS and other technologies. His interests include Machine Learning and Linear Algebra and Computational Systems Biology.

Anusha Kulkarni, Head, Life Science Division

Mrs Anusha Kulkarni, is active in research since 2011. Her research interests and active areas include Ethno-botanical study, Drug development, Tribal Medicine Research, Qualitative & Quantitative analysis of Bioactive compounds, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Immunology, Clinical Examinations of Bioactive compounds, Chromatographic Techniques, Genomics, Proteomics & Mass Spectrometry (MS), Bioinformatics, in vitro and in vivo cancer studies, Clinical research & Clinical Data Management. She is associated with various Private & Government Agencies in exploring her research interests.

Yogish , VP, Product Development

Mr.Yogish is a highly skilled and seasoned developer. He is very passionate about writing apps for mobile and web. He has a rich working experience in wide range of technical stack which includes iOS, C#, .Net frameworks, Xamarin, Node.js, React & React-Native. He has delivered number of apps having millions of users in traffic for some of the giant corporations.He has a very strong iOS and web development experience and has developed number of apps which are both horizontally and vertically scalable.

Vaidehi Deshpande, Product Head

Vaidehi is a very passionate engineer who is quite passionate about handling geographically distributed teams and streamline the product management activities

Mrs.Gayathri Kulkarni, Certified Life Coach

Mrs. Gayathri Kulkarni is a very accomplished educator. She has a very stong experience in various strata of acedemics from being a teacher to principal. She is passionate about bringing reforms in teching methodologies and is a certied professional in creative teaching and is a life coach.
